titleStmt.title: A presentation to London being an answer to the young men and apprentices returned to some part of their petition and addresse directed by them to the major, aldermen and common-councel assembled, and this is directed to them for their better information and to the citizens of London for their better satisfaction ...
titleStmt.author: Hookes, Ellis, d. 1681.
